docs.lead_paragraph: Phil Berger's novel, ''Big Man,'' will be published in the fall by Summit Books. By Phil Berger n the locker room of the Yankees' spring-training quarters in Fort Lauderdale, Fla., David Mark Winfield sits at his dressing cubicle, wearing a size 44 pin-stripe jersey and not much else. Around him, reporters, photographers and sportscasters mill, waiting for baseball's highest-paid player to go to work for the New York team.
